Title: Christmas for a Dollar

Actors: Brian Krause, Nancy Stafford, Danielle C. Ryan, Heather Beers
Plot: America is in the midst of the Depression, and the Kamp family is struggling to get by, especially after Mrs. Kamp's untimely death. Now little Ruthie, with her mother gone and her father ...
